title: Parkour Animations
longDescription:
Parkour Animations Pack

PREVIEW

UPDATE PREVIEW


Discord Server


Includes 250+ Animations:

  • 26 Locomotion Animations;
  • 6 Jumps;
  • 4 Loops in (the) Air;
  • 38 Vaults;
  • 12 Wall Vaults;
  • 10 Drop Animations;
  • 14 Landing Animations;
  • 4 Wall Runs;
  • 30 Ledge Animations.


Update 90+ Animations:

  • 8 Slides (both sides);
  • 11 Various Vaults (including from Idle);
  • 12 Horizontal Wall Runs and Jumps;
  • 12 Tic-Tac moves;
  • 26 Beam Hanging moves;
  • 8 Beam Balancing moves;
  • 16 Vertical Pipe animations;


 To implement animations in your game, I can recommend this blueprint system: Parkour Motion Warping System

technicalDetails:
CharacterMovement Speed:

Features:

  •  Hand-crafted Animations
  •  Over 250 Animations
  •  There are Root Motion and In-place animations

Rigged to Epic skeleton: Yes

If rigged to the Epic skeleton, IK bones are included: Yes

Number of Animations: 257

Animation types (Root Motion/In-place): 146 RootMotion / 11 In-place
